name: Fight The Dracula!
description:
You are a cute little thing and you fight a big scary thing by jumping and shooting it in the face!

Here are the controls (they are also listed in a text file that comes with the game):

KEYBOARD:

  [ARROW KEYS] TO MOVE

  [CTRL / SHIFT / X] TO SHOOT

  [SPACE / RETURN / C] TO JUMP

  [R] TO RESPAWN

XBOX PAD:

  [LEFT STICK / D-PAD] TO MOVE

  [X / B] TO SHOOT

  [Y / A] TO JUMP

  [WHATEVER THE SELECT BUTTON IS CALLED] TO RESPAWN
